P3GLEG/Whaler

Reverse engineers Docker images into Dockerfiles

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Compiles docker images into binaries
  • Downloads Docker images without Docker environment
  • Builds disk images using Dockerfile syntax
  • Compresses and converts images on Docker infrastructure
  • Tool for managing Docker containers and images from a web interface
  • Container security scanning platform for Docker images
  • Tool for viewing Docker image layers and investigating image contents
  • terminal UI for managing Docker containers, inspired by k9s
  • docker scripts and helper files for building, managing, and running containers
  • Convert a Docker image into a standalone executable you can run or share
